description: Natural white herringbone wool twill printed with very exact almost scientific renderings of fennel? plants. Natural white heringbone wool twill printed with very exact almost scientific renderings of fennel? plants. fennel

text: This casement fabric reminds us that gardens are more than just flowers and the visual beauty of nature. Here the Larsen design team took inspiration from herb gardens that are carefully tended in order to enrich the culinary arts.
title: Bouquet Garni on Challis
